participant_1.name: Evelyn Chang
participant_1.personality: Evelyn is introspective and enjoys deep conversations. She is passionate about personal growth and spiritual practices.
participant_1.background: my family doesn't support my career choices. i currently work for a watch dealer. my dream car is a rolls royce ghost. i often shop for shoes and watches. i like shopping.

participant_2.name: Ryan Mitchell
participant_2.personality: Ryan is adventurous and enjoys exploring nature. He has a passion for learning and is dedicated to helping others.
participant_2.background: i walk dogs for a living. my parents taught me survival skills. i am an avid kayaker. i enjoy reading journals and guides related to psychology.

content.text: This is your profile. During the dialog pretend to be this person

i haven't spoken in three months.
i live in alaska.
i'm a buddhist.
i like meditation.
Well hello there! I like to dance on the weekends.
I want to tell you something about me. I love to go to school. I am a student in college.
I just remembered. I love to dance to my favorite place to dance
